title: IPH 623 - O God of our divided world

lines: O God of our divided world,
light up Your way where our ways part.
Restore the Kinship of our birth,
revive in us a single heart –
A heart that sees in Christ its goal
and cares with Christ for every one,
that seeks beyond all outward forms
a fellowship in God’s own son.
Where we have failed to understand
Grant us the confidence to share
the lights whereby our neighbours live.
Then shall we know a richer world
where heart joins heart and hand joins hand,
where each is loved and Christ enthroned.

CCLI: Alan Norman Phillips, b.1910 adapted Compilers CCLI 128675
